name: EVE (soupsouppp)
description:
EVE is a role-playing stealth game created upon the theme "1+1 =3". After the younger twin sister got bullied multiple times in school, the older sister took care of that stupid boy for her sweet sister. But actions come with consequences, they must work together to dump the body away. Using the older sister to distract enemies, and the younger sister to move the body, sneak your way through different levels for the one and only goal - get away with this terrible crime. 

Controls: 

WASD - Move 

Q - Switch between two sisters

Walk into objects in different locations to hide (such as under the table, trash cans, bushes, and factory boxes)
